html: Having prophesied the fate of Assyria, Isaiah now comes back again to the promise to a remnant of Israel. Although she will be scattered among the Gentiles and will be dependent upon them, Israel will once again rely upon the Holy One of Israel in truth and will return. Paul quotes Isaiah 10:22 (with other prophecies) to show the Romans, who were Gentiles, that the righteous of Israel will be saved as well as the righteous Gentiles (see Rom. 9:27).
